postReview.title: Leicester City 0-1 Liverpool: Alexander-Arnold confirms hosts' relegation
postReview.description: Trent Alexander-Arnold sealed Leicester City's fate on Sunday, with his goal sending them straight back to the Championship.

preReview.title: Slot: Keeping Van Dijk and Salah shows Liverpool's ambitions
preReview.description: Arne Slot is delighted that Virgil van Dijk and Mohamed Salah have both signed new contracts with Liverpool, opting to extend their stays.

QAData.question: Who won between Leicester City and Liverpool on Sun, 20 Apr 2025 15:30:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Liverpool won 1–0 over Leicester City on Sun, 20 Apr 2025 15:30:00 GMT.

funFacts.fallback: Virgil van Dijk completed the most passes (76) in the match.
Mohamed Salah hit the woodwork 2 times in 7 total shots.
Mohamed Salah has the least touches (41) of any outfield player.
Ibrahima Konaté was Player of the Match with a rating of 8.
Ibrahima Konaté is the most accurate passer (93%) in the match.
Luis Diaz created the most chances (4) in the match.
Conor Bradley is the most fouled player in the match (3 times).
